2103590.name: Jahto: Savior of the Sky
2103590.description:
Platforming Meets Adventure

Jahto: Savior of the Sky is a unique blend of 3D platforming and adventure. Explore vibrant, mystical worlds inspired by ancient civilizations, filled with secrets to uncover.
Golden coins scattered across the sky worlds unlock new abilities, making it easier to explore new areas and defeat the mischievous creatures.

A Journey to Save the Sky Worlds

The sacred sky worlds are being disrupted by an ancient force, and Jahto, the young owl prince, embarks on a journey to stop it. Though still inexperienced, he is determined to do whatever it takes to save the sky and its inhabitants.

As corrupted crystals are destroyed, the evil’s grip on these worlds weakens. However, finding them can be quite tricky. They may be hidden, require solving puzzles or be earned through quests from the sky dwellers.

Unlock New Worlds

Jahto: Savior of the Sky features a tutorial level, a central hub world, and a variety of themed environments, such as deserts and snowy landscapes, all accessible through mystical sky portals.
Along the way, you'll encounter mini-levels focused on pure platforming trials, each one pushing your abilities further. The journey leads to an ultimate confrontation with the ancient evil that has corrupted the sky worlds.

A Versatile Moveset

Our hero’s moveset offers great flexibility, allowing players to combine abilities in any order they prefer. This freedom is crucial for navigating environments and overcoming obstacles.
Mastering the fluid combination of skills is key to progressing through the game’s challenges.


Captured your interest? Add Jahto: Savior of the Sky to your wishlist!
